headline.main: RAF NIGHT BOMBERS STRIKE IN GERMANY; New Raid Follows U.S. Blows at Nazi Airfields in France

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Tuesday, Aug. 3 (AP) -- Royal Air Force heavy bombers took to the air again last night after two nights of inactivity to renew their assaults on Germany, the British announced today.
abstract: RAF renews attacks on Ger after 2-night lull
snippet: LONDON, Tuesday, Aug. 3 (AP) -- Royal Air Force heavy bombers took to the air again last night after two nights of inactivity to renew their assaults on Germany, the British announced today....
